Narrative:
Belgian Catholic bishops defied Vatican and agreed to give their blessing to same sex couples, this was announced on Bishops’ Conference of Belgium website on 20 September.

They mentioned, this is not what the church understands by a sacramental marriage but taking a step towards a church that excludes no one. Bishops are also suggested to denounce homophobia.

Ritual of prayer and a commitment to be faithful to each other constitutes the blessings from bishops. Willy Bombeek will oversee LGBTQ+ Catholics.

In March 2021, the Vatican ruled that the Catholic Church cannot bless same-sex unions, as God “does not and cannot bless sin.” Bishops in Belgium, decided otherwise. A great step towards acceptance.

Title:
It's a YES from Flemish Church for 'committed' same sex unions :

Belgian Catholic bishops defied Va
